content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI remembered asking my computer to Google how to sign up for the online Spanish writing course offered by Instituto Hemingway, and received search results including links to the Instituto Hemingway website and other websites such as GoAbroad and GoOverseas. I then used the command "browse_website" to access the Go Overseas website and asked for details about the online Spanish writing course for heritage speakers offered by Instituto Hemingway. The command "browse_website" returned that the website does not provide information on the details of the course. My latest action was to use the command "google" to search for information on how to sign up for the course through Go Overseas.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.goabroad.com/providers/instituto-hemingway/programs/online-spanish-course-for-heritage-speakers-158314", "https://www.gooverseas.com/language-schools/spain/program/270579", "https://www.goabroad.com/articles/study-abroad/learn-spanish-over-the-summer", "https://www.gooverseas.com/language-schools/online?page=1", "https://international.fsu.edu/Program/Spain/BroadCurriculum.aspx", "https://www.institutohemingway.com/blog/807/top-5-reasons-to-study-spanish-in-bilbao.html", "https://www.openculture.com/freelanguagelessons", "https://www.institutohemingway.com/blog/237/the-importance-of-pragmatics-in-the-spanish-foreign-language-classroom.html"]'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "contact information for Go Overseas or Instituto Hemingway"}}}'}]
"""
